Dunnerdale Fell Race

Saturday 13th November 2021

Entry List
ENTER ONLINE
Entries Open
Thursday 2nd September 2021
Entries Close
Wednesday 10th November 2021
Entries so Far

Entry Fees

FRA Member: £9

Non-Member: £11
Contact
Nick Sebley - Organiser
Phone
01229 715021
Email
nsebley@aol.com
Website
https://fellrace.org.uk/races/dunnerdale

To enter you must first Log In or Register your Details with SiEntries.

Dunnerdale is a classic short race round the tiny but rugged fells between the Lickle and the Duddon valleys. The scenery is superb, the course is tough and varied and there’s a very nice pub at the finish.

This event offers the option to purchase upgraded refundable terms, so that participants may be able to get a refund if they are unable to attend due to unforeseen circumstances.
